team.name: Capt. Helena Vance
team.description: A former astronaut and a propulsion physicist, Capt. Vance brings unparalleled expertise and vision to Orion, leading the team towards uncharted territories.

team.name: Dr. Hiroshi Nakamura
team.description: A genius in aerospace engineering, Dr. Nakamura's innovations form the backbone of Orion's groundbreaking spacecrafts and aerial vehicles.

team.name: Leo Rodriguez
team.description: With a penchant for blending aesthetics with functionality, Leo ensures that every Orion product is not just effective but also a piece of art.

team.name: Ava O'Connell
team.description: With a penchant for blending aesthetics with functionality, Leo ensures that every Orion product is not just effective but also a piece of art.

team.name: Dr. Imani Okor
team.description: A space historian and a former NASA educator, Dr. Okoro shapes the curriculum, ensuring that the academy produces the best minds in aerospace.
